pkgmetadata.longdescription:
pycord-components

based on discord.py components - to comply with py-cord

## Welcome!Discord components are cool, but pycord's document lacks ease of use in components. Itis hard to wait, so we made a third-party library for using components such asbuttons or selects!This project is open source ‚≠ê.## Features- You can use message components and handle component interactions easily!- Third-party of pycord.- It is simply changed version of discord-components which doesn't require discord.py. Why? Because it is deprecated.## Install```pip install --upgrade pycord-components```## LicenseThis project is under the MIT License.
